price: (50) Their garments of liquid pitch and their faces covered by the Fire
arabic: سَرَابِيلُهُم مِّن قَطِرَانٖ وَتَغۡشَىٰ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: sarābīluhum min qaṭirānin wataghshā wujūhahumu al-nāru
